short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension loads professor ratings into Carleton's schedule builder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is intended for use by Carleton University students. Once the extension has been installed it will update the Carleton course selection page in real time by adding each professors rating out of 5 (based on student reviews) alongside their name. This allows for a quicker and more informed schedule making process.
